about_the_game:
Welcome to the experiment
In this first-person psychological horror game full of pseudo random events, you will participate in an experiment confined in an apartment, your only contact with the world will be the talks with the person in charge of the study to check your progress, you must follow the instructions given by the person in charge of the experiment and distinguish if what you see while you explore the apartment and perform the tasks is real or is for your mental issue.


Explore the environment in this immersive psychological horror game, and keep in mind that the only way to overcome fear is to confront it directly.

Features


  • Free 3D movement in a photorealistic environment full of jump scares.
  • Immersive horror experience both visually and narratively.
  • As the subject of the experiment you will answer certain questions to the person in charge of the experiment and depending on the answers will change the course of the story.

name: Moved mind

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit revision .789 or higher.
  • Processor: Windows 10 64-bit revision .789 or higher.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Requires an NVIDIA GeForce GTX-1080 or higher card.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit revision .789 or higher.
  • Processor: Windows 10 64-bit revision .789 or higher.
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Requires an NVIDIA GeForce GTX-2080 or higher card.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Moved mind is a first person narrative psychological horror game, where you will be the subject of a psychological experiment where you will have to face your fears and differentiate reality from the symptoms of your illness.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
*languages with full audio support
